path.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(44, 169, 188); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(44, 169, 188); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
